Looks like you have a few issues there.  Firstly, you're missing the gpg keys for your ppas. You can use: sudo apt-key adv --recv-keys --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com <key>    for getting them, where <key> is the last bit of the error message on lines 1-4.
Secondly, you may want to check that the PPAs urls are correct.
so i imported the gpg keys that were giving me errors and all is good
servers have their own set of ssh keys that are separate from their user's keys.
oh that makes sense i was a little confused there for a sec
